name: Ultrascape Megaquest LXIX: The Multiverse Genesis XR REDUX
name_original: Ultrascape Megaquest LXIX: The Multiverse Genesis XR REDUX
description:
Ultrascape Megaquest LXIX: The Multiverse Genesis XR REDUX

The long awaited sequel to "Ultrascape Megaquest LXVIII: The Revengeance Chronicles" is finally here!

SUMMARY!

After destroying Chronohex Emeralds, and defeating the Great (i forgot if they were Great or Grand) Convocation of XIII, you have finally reached the final evildoer's lair!

Now, armed with your mighty sword (the sword has a name but no one knows it), you must finally face the evil that torments the land and save the world!

CONTROLS!

Use the WASD keys to move your lil' legs.

Aim the mouse to aim your sword!

Left Click (Hold) to swing your sword and purge the evil!

W or Space can be used to jump. If you press it again in mid-air, you double jump.

S can be used to fall to the ground faster while in the air. This is a forbidden technique.

CREDITS!

me :)

Rienzi did music with me.

... my highscore is 4, post yours in the chat ;v)

Rainy Dan · Ultrascape Megaquest LXIX: The Multiverse Genesis XR Redux - Soundtrack
